============
Shell Colors
============


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/shcolors.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/shcolors

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/benbacardi/shcolors.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/benbacardi/shcolors

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/shcolors/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://shcolors.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




A utility for outputting different colored text to the shell


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://shcolors.readthedocs.io.
